Title: Provides for the filling of vacancies in the office of lieutenant-governor by appointment of the governor subject to confirmation by the senate and assembly
Summary: Provides for the filling of vacancies in the office of lieutenant-governor by appointment of the governor subject to confirmation by majority vote in the senate and majority vote in the assembly.
ActClause: Concurrent Resolution of the Senate and Assembly proposing an amendment to article 4 of the constitution, in relation to the filling of vacancies in the office of lieutenant-governor
